metadata.Title: CVE-2017-6967 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: xrdp 0.9.1 calls the PAM function auth_start_session() in an incorrectlocation, leading to PAM session modules not being properly initialized,with a potential consequence of incorrect configurations or elevation ofprivileges, aka a pam_limits.so bypass.

criterions.comment: xrdp: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
